Mengcheng county in Bozhou 亳州[Bo2 zhou1], Anhui

sentences.english: Ni Ping sojourns to Meng Cheng, on dish one ox flogs, taste is especially good, ask why content?
sentences.chinese: 倪萍到蒙城作客，菜上一牛鞭，味道特好，问曰何物？

sentences.english: It has been a long time since I left Mengcheng for my home.
sentences.chinese: 我离开蒙城回到家已经很长时间了。
